attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are 'days' now for almost everything, but now one for Motorcycles.
I propose that there is a day for the most efficient motorised transport there is, and on that day all those with a motorbike be encouraged to use it to go to work on.
The rest of the public will then see how much less congestion there is and how much fun we have on our Bikes.
Lets get everyone onto motorbikes and make this country greener, cleaner and happier!
